name: Tank Wars (itch) (ACE Games)
description:
Tank Wars is a battle between two tanks.  You got 90 seconds to shoot your opponent for 1 point each hit, and try to capture your enemy's flag for 10 points.  Be sure to avoid the mines in the middle, which will give your opponent 1 point.  Good luck, and win the battle!

Controls:

Player 1: W=Forward, A=Left, D=Right, S=Back, F=Shoot

Player 2: Up=Forward, Left=Left, Right=Right, Down=Back, /=Shoot
